author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: A lot of the presidential aspirants in APC will willingly bow to @MBuhari anointed candidate and their EOI and N100m is what they want to use to reap in the process either by appointments,future contracts.

author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: The political campaign buzzword that won 2015 election for @MBuhari was Integrity. In 2023, it will be INTEGRITY+COMPETENCE.Nigerians without a doubt knows the candidate that possess this @OfficialAPCNg @OfficialPDPNig

author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: Nigerians are very loud and passionate people, be careful not to let this affect your relationships with your family members,friends in the May 2022 political roforofo. The will of God and of the people will be done.Happy New Month

author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: My life first understanding long time ago is LIFE IS A VANITY and it moved to not been fazed with any worldly things and finally whatever YOU SOW,YOU WILL REAP. It has helped me to live a peaceful,steady life. #HappyEid.

author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: Someone once asked me that he thought I was been positioned for a bigger role having supported my boss for almost two decades…but it is the boss that knows best. Not you, Not me and Not anyone. Best thing is not to get involved. Are you me?Is it your boss?

author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: Everything Nigerian Politician wants to achieve, they quote the Constitution of the Federal Republic of Nigeria.For the citizenry,it is through the benevolence of the politicians and Grace of God.

author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: All the lies of the @OfficialAPCNg have gone full cycle…Fighting corruption and pardoning looters convicted,fighting insecurity and romancing bandits and terrorist,improving economy and improve rising Nigerians more. Association of Proud Criminals(APC)

author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: One of my Dad famous line is “Survival of the Fittest”as I learnt in the the narration of the New @BarackObama documentary on Our Great National Parks. As humans, we need to strike a balance with the flora and fauna of the world as we are all in this together.

author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: The support for PMB administration has been almost 100% until now.if VP has openly gone against his Boss before now he would have been tagged NOT LOYAL by same supporters of PMB. Now is time for everyone to answer his Fathers Name.

text: It’s a shame to @OfficialAPCNg how a sitting Vice President is been ridiculed after 7 years of service to the party and the country. Same thing they did in Lagos to Ambode. All happened from LAGOS, center of Excellence

author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: No matter how powerful you are, you cannot be more powerful than the President of the Federal Republic of Nigeria. Only God gives power.

author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: Ronaldo breaking a young evertonian phone is as bad as Will Smith slapping Chris Rock at the Oscars. It shouldn’t be passed over lightly by @premierleague Thorough investigations and sanctions must be meted out if found culpable.Role Models should be Anger Managers as well.

author: Adedolapo Odunowo
text: SWAGA is waiting for Primary and Fair contest. I don’t think PMB is blind to How Ambode was given an opportunity to go for a second term on a free and fair primary. That is the year everything changed
